spec (St. Peter's Engineering College) was established in 7 in Hyderabad. It is affiliated with JNTU and approved by AICTE. The college is known for its technical education and ranks among the top private engineering institutes in Telangana.
You can call me the Spec Enquiry Bot.
I'm the official college enquiry assistant!
The college operates from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday through Saturday. Closed on Sundays.

patterns: How can I reach the college?
responses: You can contact the college at +91 90000 08578 or +91 90320 08578. Email us at principal@stpetershyd.com or visit our website: https://spechyd.ac.in
We offer various programs including IT, Civil, EEE, Mechanical, ECE, CSE, AIDS, AIML, and CSG. Below are more details for individual departments.

The CSE department offers a comprehensive program that covers programming languages, algorithms, computer networks, and machine learning. The curriculum focuses on both theoretical and practical knowledge. Students can also specialize in fields like Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing, and Data Science.

The IT department is known for its emphasis on software development, networking, data management, and cybersecurity. The program offers training in the latest IT tools and technologies, preparing students for roles in the fast-evolving IT industry.

ECE at St. Peter's focuses on communication systems, VLSI design, signal processing, and microelectronics. The program combines hands-on experience with industry knowledge, equipping students for roles in telecom, semiconductor, and embedded systems industries.

The AIML department specializes in cutting-edge technologies like deep learning, computer vision, and AI ethics. Students gain exposure to both foundational and advanced AI techniques, preparing them for roles in data science, AI research, and machine learning engineering.

The Civil Engineering department covers areas such as structural engineering, geotechnics, environmental engineering, and transportation engineering. Students are trained to design and manage construction projects while considering environmental and societal impact.

Mechanical Engineering is a versatile field covering subjects like thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, materials science, and robotics. Students learn how to design, manufacture, and maintain mechanical systems, preparing them for careers in aerospace, automotive, and energy industries.

The AIDS department focuses on the integration of AI technologies with data science techniques. Students learn to analyze large datasets, build AI models, and deploy intelligent systems to solve real-world problems in industries such as healthcare, finance, and retail.

The CSG department emphasizes network security, ethical hacking, cryptography, and incident response. Students gain skills to secure systems and networks against cyber threats and work in industries like banking, government, and IT services.

Our top recruiters include Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, and more. The average package is around ₹4.5 LPA, and the highest package can go up to ₹12 LPA. For more details, visit: https://spechyd.ac.in/placements

We have separate hostels for boys and girls. Boys' hostel is close to the campus, while the girls' hostel is within the college. Facilities include Wi-Fi, water coolers, security, and medical rooms. Hostel fees start from ₹40,000 per year.
Yes, we have a central library with a rich collection of books, journals, and e-resources. The digital library allows access to e-books and research papers online.
We have various student clubs, including cultural, technical, and sports clubs. For more details, check: https://spechyd.ac.in/student-corner/about-student-clubs/
The fees for different courses vary. For B.Tech, it is approximately ₹90,000 per year. For M.Tech, it starts around ₹1,00,000 per year. For more details, visit: https://spechyd.ac.in/fees-structure

Yes, we offer scholarships based on merit and economic status. Scholarships are provided under government schemes as well as private organizations. For more information, visit: https://spechyd.ac.in/scholarships
The college is located in Hyderabad. The address is: Maisammaguda, Opp. Forest Academy, Medchal-Malkajgiri District, Telangana. It's well connected by road and public transport.
